name: run-step-get
title: Get Run Step Details
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific step in a run execution. Use this to examine what the assistant did during a particular step, debug specific issues, or understand tool calls and message creation in detail.

thread_id.description: The unique identifier of the thread containing the run (format: "thread_abc123...").

run_id.description: The unique identifier of the run containing the step (format: "run_abc123...").

step_id.description: The unique identifier of the step to retrieve (format: "step_abc123...").

examples.title: Examine specific step
examples.description: Get detailed information about what happened in a particular run step
